question: Which country is set to host the 2021 International Cricket Council (ICC) T20 World Cup?
explanation:
As per the recent notification of the International Cricket Council (ICC), India retained the right to host the 2021 T20 World Cup.
ICC also announced that Australia will conduct this year’s (T20 World Cup 2020) postponed edition of the World Cup Tournament in 2022. Next year’s women’s ODI World Cup in New Zealand has been postponed till February-March 2022.
